meanings.definition: Having knowledge or perception of a situation or fact.
meanings.sent1: She was aware of the danger lurking nearby.
meanings.sent2: He is always aware of the time when he needs to leave.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed aware of the mouse's presence but pretended not to notice.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's eyes were aware of every student's movement in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The detective's keen awareness helped solve the mystery quickly.

meanings.sent1: They were aware of the latest news updates.
meanings.sent2: She is aware of the rules and regulations of the game.
meanings.sent3: The robot became aware of its programming and started making jokes.
meanings.sent4: His awareness of the subject made him the go-to person for advice.
meanings.sent5: The team's awareness of the opponent's strategy led to a successful counterattack.

meanings.definition: Conscious of one's surroundings or environment.
meanings.sent1: The hiker was aware of the rustling leaves in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Children should always be aware of their surroundings when crossing the street.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked around, aware of the impending rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: The old house seemed aware of the new family moving in.
meanings.sent5: The security guard's keen awareness prevented any unauthorized entry.
